Great Classic! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Frank Tashlin'], 'Producers': ['Harriet Parsons'], 'Starring': ['Dick Powell', 'Debbie Reynolds', 'Anne Francis'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} This movie is a cute one n delightful. Airy n lighthearted!~ Debbie Reynolds is ever amusing as she is pretty at heart, plus!~ A super-delightful movie that leaves you feeling uplifted!~ A Happy Heart Movie!~ {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stanley Donen', 'Eugene Kelly'], 'Producers': ['Arthur Freed'], 'Starring': ['Eugene Kelly', "Donald O'Connor", 'Debbie Reynolds'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} A very very uplifting n happy movie with the three marvelous singin' n dancin' actors! Donald O'Connor is so limber n flexible in his moves n funny as can be in that "Make em Laugh" scene! He's very I'm using to watch! Kelly sings so smooth n his dancing is one of a kind~ It's always so great to watch him in that singin' in the rain review!~ Sweet n cute Debbie is at her best in that dancin' review with the rest of the girls wearing short pink outfits n throwing candy from the huge built in pocket on their hip~ Loved it!~ Light n airy!~ You always get well entertained from watching this movie!~ A Feel Great Movie! {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['ZinnemannFred'], 'Producers': ['Oscar Hammerstein II', 'Arthur Hornblow Jr.', 'Richard Rodgers'], 'Starring': ['Gordon Macrae', 'Gloria Grahame', 'Shirley Jones'], 'Studio': ['Classics']} When I was a little girl in the mid-1950's, I recall when my grandmother took my mom n two sisters, and I, to see this picture in downtown LA, when it came out in 1955. It was a very delightful musical that we all enjoyed n a very good picture! If you like musicals, (which to say, I'm not a person who is very fond of them), this one you will honestly like~👍 I recommend one to see it. To me, it was the best "Oklahoma" picture made!~ Frankly,... I never forgot that nostalgic era n time when my wonderful grandma took us to see, "Oklahoma~" Great movie!~ The Best Oklahoma Picture!~ {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nathan Hertz'], 'Producers': ['Bernard Woolner'], 'Starring': ['Allison Hayes', 'William Hudson', 'Roy Gordon'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Ay.. A typical 1950ish science-fiction story that's okay if you don't mind it being a smidge cheesey! ... All about a huge lady walking around wanting her husband Harry all to herself- lol!! Big Lady! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Bulter'], 'Producers': ['William Jacobs'], 'Starring': ['Doris Day', 'Howard Keel', 'Allyn Ann McLerie'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} A-1 movie! Cute n sweet! Entertaining!~ {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Burton'], 'Producers': ['Robert Shapiro', 'Richard Gilbert Abramson'], 'Starring': ['Pee-wee Herman', 'E. G. Daily', 'Mark Holton'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Ridiculous movie! Ridiculous Movie! {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven Spielberg'], 'Producers': ['George Eckstein'], 'Starring': ['Dennis Weaver', 'Jacqueline Scott', 'Eddie Firestone'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']} Action pact movie as usual!~ Seen movie a dozen times! A 'stepping stone'-'building up to,'.. suspenseful movie!~ ..HOWEVER!-
The sound quality is 'VERY POOR' each time I order a movie from Prime Video. They rev up the sound effects 'so sky-high loud' that you have to keep lowering the volume each time. But when they speak, you can 'barely hear' the actors speaking! Then you have to swing up the volume each time they talk!- You can hardly even hear them. And, I have the sound 'maxed out' to the highest level on my tv!- Amazon has a marvelous array of movies but they have got to try to improve the adjustment of their sound with these movies! Or,.. I've got to drop Prime Video and use another station. 'Think I'll let Amazon know soon concerning this "movie vs. sound"quality problem. "Duel" has always been a great movie~ You'll love it!!~ Great Movie!!~ Bad/Poor Sound Quality!! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jerry Lewis'], 'Producers': ['Ernest D. Glucksman', 'Arthur P. Schmidt'], 'Starring': ['Sally Mansfield', 'Michael Landon', 'Brian Donlevy'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Funny/Hilarious movie! But, as with all their movies I rent from them, it's either: TOO high and TOO low soundtrack volume- 'Terrible! It's that way with most all of their movies!- 'NO FUN' watching them- Very disappointing indeed!--😕😒 🙌👌😆😀👍--->>>👎👎👎😠😕😯-->>😳
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **General Preferences:** The user maintains a strong passion for classic and vintage cinema, particularly enjoying films from Hollywood's golden age, which reflect their nostalgic connection to this genre.

- **Genre Interest:** Primarily drawn to comedy and drama, the user also appreciates quirky narratives in science fiction, alongside a fondness for musicals and heartfelt storytelling.

- **Rating Tendencies:** Recently, the user highly rated a hilarious classic film, showcasing their enjoyment of feel-good cinema. However, they expressed ongoing frustration with sound issues in modern rentals, indicating a critical perspective on technical quality, particularly with soundtrack volume.

- **Physical Media Format:** The user values collecting DVDs to enhance their nostalgic film-watching experience, suggesting a preference for physical media over streaming.

- **Cultural Engagement:** They actively seek cross-cultural narratives that enrich their cinematic experiences with diverse storytelling.

- **Actor/Director Recognition:** The user admires classic performers and appreciates the artistry involved in musicals, highlighting their affinity for talented actors.

- **Technical Preferences:** Recent feedback emphasizes the user's disappointment with inconsistent audio quality in films from rental services, reinforcing their need for clear sound in their viewing experience. This has led to serious contemplation of alternatives if issues persist.

Overall, the profile illustrates a user who treasures uplifting storytelling and classic cinema while maintaining a critical eye on technical aspects, especially in modern film consumption.
